Name: Assassins' Guild
Description:
The Ankh-Morpork Assassins' Guild is a school for professional killers.
	It is pretty easy to get into a trouble in the Shades and make enemies.
	Someone definitely wants to kill you.
	You can create a contract with the guild to kill the enemy first.
	Each assassin takes the contract only if not occupied.

Npcs.Name: Robert von Schneider
Npcs.MeetMessage: Hey mister, hold on, I came to kill you! And bribery is TOTALLY not an option!!!
Npcs.OfferMessage: OK, how much you WILL DEFINITELY NOT give me?
Npcs.DenyMessage: With the power given to me by the Assassins' Guild of Shades, I take your life!

Npcs.Name: Alberto
Npcs.MeetMessage: Let's be clear, I came to kill you, you can redeem yourself, your action..?

Npcs.Name: Tamara
Npcs.MeetMessage: Hey sweety, wanna have a lunch with me?
Npcs.AcceptMessage: Thanks for the drink, see you later
Npcs.DenyMessage: I am so sorry, I gotta go...

Name: Thieves' Guild
Description:
You can get robbed anytime and will have to pay a standard fee to the guild member.
	But total number of thefts during the game can't be greater then socially acceptable number of thefts.

Npcs.Name: Katy
Npcs.MeetMessage: Honey, whats that up in the sky
Npcs.DenyMessage: *Her face is the last thing you see*

Name: Beggars' Guild
Description:
The Beggars' Guild is the oldest, largest and (perhaps surprisingly) richest of the city's many guilds.
	It has a very strict code of practice and enforced hierarchy.
	Anyone attempting to move above his position or perform his
	sanctioned role out of his assigned area or time period is harshly dealt with.

Npcs.Name: Garold
Npcs.MeetMessage: Toss a coin to your twitcher

Npcs.Name: Fat man
Npcs.MeetMessage: Asking for money is my job and duty

Npcs.Name: One-eye Walker
Npcs.MeetMessage: Hey millionaire, wanna share your dirty money!?

Npcs.Name: Billy
Npcs.MeetMessage: I wanna eat, adventurer, give me some money for meal

Npcs.Name: Valera the Bomzh
Npcs.MeetMessage: Arrrkhh!!! Why'd wake me up, man

Name: Clowns' Guild
Description:
Walking the city you might meet one of a very good friends.
	The friend works as a fool and will ask you for help.
	You have to pretend to be a fool (pick the same practice as a friend).
	That's how you can earn some money.

Npcs.Name: Vasylii
Npcs.MeetMessage: You give me $1000, I give you $10000

Npcs.Name: Vlad
Npcs.MeetMessage: What card is in my pocket???
Npcs.AcceptMessage: ... Right, I don't have pockets.... Whatever...'

Npcs.Name: Huan
Npcs.MeetMessage: Soy un idiota, quiero darte dinero.
Npcs.DenyMessage: No quieres no tienes que hacerlo

Npcs.Name: Ko-Ko-Ko
Npcs.MeetMessage: Hello adventurer, wanna check your IQ
Npcs.AcceptMessage: Wow, you just as dumb as I am, take it...

Npcs.Name: Oldman Giuseppe
Npcs.AcceptMessage: Take it, boy, I'm not gonna need it...
